title: Tomb Raider 5: Chronicles pc
description:
Lara Croft Tomb Raider 5: Chronicles.

All files are copied from original cd and zipped. You have to burn them on a cd and you can play.

System requirements:
Pentium 3 500mhz
128 mb RAM
300 mb free disk space
directX 8.1 compatible sound card
directx 8.1 compitable graphic card with 16mb.
4x cd-rom drive
Windows 98/me/2000/xp

Works great directly copied from original cd so burn on cd and play.
1. burn the unzipped files on a cd.
2. select the cd and open the files on it.
3. selct and double-click Setup.
4. folow the Lara Croft- Tomb raider setup.
5. when installed, select PC tomb 5 when it doesn&#039;t play automatic.
6. Play the game and have fun!

(please leave comment when it doesn&#039;t work properly, so I can help you)
